description: An illustration of eight blueish-silver balloons: there are four balloons that consist of the numbers 2, 0, 2, and 3 to form the year 2023; there is another number 2 balloon floating above the other four balloons (this signifies the passing of the year 2022 and the coming of the year 2023). There are also three regular round silver balloons; two float above and behind the balloons forming 2023 and one floats in front of them.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
